articles.title: UN says 'staggering' deaths of rights activists in Colombia
articles.description: The United Nations human rights agency is expressing alarm at what it calls a “staggering” number of activist deaths in Colombia
articles.content:
BOGOTA, Colombia -- 
The office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights expressed alarm on Tuesday at what it called a staggering number of activist deaths in Colombia. 
The U.N. agency said that 107 human rights defenders were killed in 20… [+602 chars]

articles.title: Swedish driver Ericsson lands hot chocolate company sponsor
articles.description: A Swedish-based hot chocolate company has signed on as primary sponsor for Swedish driver Marcus Ericsson at Chip Ganassi Racing for the upcoming IndyCar season
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- 
A hot chocolate company led by Hollywood stuntman and occasional racer Stanton Barrett has signed as primary sponsor for Swedish driver Marcus Ericsson at Chip Ganassi Racing.
